form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: To assist in establishing the required residence, please list all affiliations or associations with clubs, organizations, churches, unions, businesses, etc., I-687 ( (04/01/87) Page 3

full_text: 34. To assist in establishing the required residence, please list all affiliations or associations with clubs, organizations, churches, unions, businesses, etc. From To Name of Organization Location (Month/Year) (Month/Year) 18115 Sherman Way, Reseda St. Catherine of Siena Church C.A. 91335 1982 Present 35. Absences from the United States since entry. (List most recent absence first and list absences back to January 1, 1982) From To Country Purpose of Trip (Month/Year) (Month/Year) El Salvadore To bury son that was killed 1-84 1-84 36. Employment in the United States since first entry. (List present or most recent first and list back to date of entry; if none since entry, write "None".) Full Name and Address of Employer (with ZIP Code) Your Annual Wages From To (or Self employed and business address) Occupation Wages per Hour (Month/Year) (Month/Year) Patrece Fowlks Baby sitter $50/wk 7/1980 Present 31717 Ridge Route Road #216 37. I have registered under the Military Selective Service Act. My Selective Service No. is I am a male over the age of 17 and under the age of 26 required to register under the Military Selective Service Act and have not done so. I wish to register at this time. SSS Form 1 is attached. am a male born after 1959 and over the age of 26 and cannot now register. I am exempt from Selective Service Registration either because 1 am a female or I was born before 1960. 38.1 have I have not assisted in the persecution of any person or persons on account of race, religion, nationality, membership in a particular social group or political opinion. 39.1 have I have not been treated for a mental disorder, drug addiction or alcoholism. 40.1 have I have not been arrested, convicted or confined in a prison. 41.1 have have not been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency or similar action. 42.1 have I have not received public assistance from any source, including, but not limited to, the United States Government, any state, county, city or municipality. (If you have, explain: including the name(s) and Social Security number(s) used.) Form I-687 (04/01/87) Page 3
